method used to be called Direct 
Radio Voice, and has long history? I have =

getting radio contacts wioht spirit.
How=

tell ya, none! No, y'all want to sit in the dark and ask what color your s=
hirt 
is then claim to be great researchers and experts. 


2-I doubt that =
it truely random, I'd like to see a scope vid of the sweep modes. 


I woul=
dn't have problem, but these people like the one putting on this video 
bel=
ittle and insult me in public. For what? For their own fame and fortune. Th=
en 
try to copy Chirs Moon, and blame the concept on Edison--freaking cluel=
ess, all 
of you!
